de.tavendo.autobahn

类 ByteBufferOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • de.tavendo.autobahn.ByteBufferOutputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ByteBufferOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
    OutputStream wrapping a ByteBuffer. This class internally allocates a direct ByteBuffer for use i.e. with NIO for socket I/O. The ByteBuffer is automatically enlarged if needed (preserving contents when enlarged).

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ByteBufferOutputStream()
      Create a direct allocated ByteBuffer wrapped as OutputStream.
      ByteBufferOutputStream(int initialSize, int growSize)
      Create a direct allocated ByteBuffer wrapped as OutputStream.

      Write one byte to the underlying ByteBuffer via this OutputStream.
      void write(java.lang.String str)
      Write the UTF-8 encoding of a String to the underlying ByteBuffer via this OutputStream.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ByteBufferOutputStream

        public ByteBufferOutputStream()
        Create a direct allocated ByteBuffer wrapped as OutputStream.

      • ByteBufferOutputStream

        public ByteBufferOutputStream(int initialSize,
                              int growSize)
        Create a direct allocated ByteBuffer wrapped as OutputStream.
        参数:
        initialSize - Initial size of ByteBuffer.
        growSize - When buffer needs to grow, enlarge by this amount.

        抛出:

      • write

        public void write(byte[] bytes,
                  int off,
                  int len)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Write a chunk of bytes to the underyling ByteBuffer via this OutputStream.
        覆盖:
        write 在类中 java.io.OutputStream
        参数:
        bytes - Write bytes from this byte array.
        off - Start reading at this offset within byte array.
        len - Write this many bytes, and enlarge underyling ByteBuffer when necessary, preserving the contents.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
